data.meta_description:
How did David Carradine die?
 David Carradine was an American actor who is best known for his roles in the television series Kung Fu and the Kill Bill film series. He was found dead in his hotel room in Bangkok, Thailand, on June 4, 2009. His death was ruled an accidental asphyxiation by autoerotic asphyxiation.  Autoerotic asphyxiation is a sexual practice that involves restricting oxygen to the brain in order to achieve sexual arousal.
